depends: python2.7, tightvncserver, apache2, libapache2-mod-dnssd, alsa-utils, gcc, libprocps0-dev
description: A web application agent for the Raspberry Pi
longDescription: The pi-web-agent is a web application that aims to provide a more user friendly way of interacting with the Raspberry Pi and performing basic tasks by eliminating the need of using the command line directly.
